Title: Directs the commissioner of education to promulgate rules and regulations that prohibit harassment, intimidation and bullying of students
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education to promulgate rules and regulations that prohibit harassment, intimidation and bullying of students; makes school districts responsible for making copies of such policies available to parents, guardians, students, volunteers and school employees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to harassment prevention policies
